title: RP ADDTO: The reflexive and transitive properties of relations

blocks.name: undmrnresiss
blocks.content: Two ways of saying the identity relation restricted to the union of the domain and range of a relation is a subset of a relation. Generalization of ~ reflexg . (Contributed by RP, 26-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm undmrnresiss(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wss(cres(cid, cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3bitr2i(wss(cres(cid, cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s1)))))), wss(cun(cres(cid, cdm(c0)), cres(cid, crn(c0))), c1), wa(wss(cres(cid, cdm(c0)), c1), wss(cres(cid, crn(c0)), c1)))
  sseq1i(cres(cid, cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), c1, cun(cres(cid, cdm(c0)), cres(cid, crn(c0))))
  resundi(cid, cdm(c0), crn(c0))
  unss(cres(cid, cdm(c0)), c1, cres(cid, crn(c0)))
  3bitr2i(wa(wss(cres(cid, cdm(c0)), c1), wss(cres(cid, crn(c0)), c1)), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s1)))))), wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s1)))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wa(wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s1)))))))
  anbi12i(wss(cres(cid, cdm(c0)), c1), wss(cres(cid, crn(c0)), c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s1))))))
  3bitri(wss(cres(cid, cdm(c0)), c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cres(cid, cdm(c0))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c1)))), wal(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))))))
  ax-mp(wb(wss(cres(cid, cdm(c0)), c1), wal(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cres(cid, cdm(c0))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c1))))), wrel(cres(cid, cdm(c0))))
  relres(cid, cdm(c0))
  ssrel(s0, hs0, cres(cid, cdm(c0)), c1)
  2albii(s0, hs0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cres(cid, cdm(c0))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c1)), wi(wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))))
  imbi12i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cres(cid, cdm(c0))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c1), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cres(cid, cdm(c0))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cid)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  anbi12ci(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cid), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  eldm(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  vex(s0)
  bitr3i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cid), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), cid, cv(hs0)))
  df-br(cv(s0), cid, cv(hs0))
  ideq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  opelresi(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cid, cdm(c0))
  19.42v(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  bicomi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)))
  df-br(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))
  bitri(wal(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wal(hs0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)))))))
  2albii(s0, hs0, wi(wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)))))
  bicomi(wi(wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)))))
  19.23v(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)))
  albii(s0, wal(hs0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))))), wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)))))
  bitri(wal(hs0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))))), wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)))), wal(s1, wal(hs0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))))))
  alcom(hs0, s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))))
  albii(s1, wal(hs0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))))
  3bitri(wal(hs0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))), wal(hs0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wal(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))))))
  albii(hs0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)))))
  bitri(wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))))

  2albii(s0, s1, wal(hs0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(hs0)))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s1))))

blocks.name: reflexg
blocks.content: Two ways of saying a relation is reflexive over its domain and range. (Contributed by RP, 4-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: cnvssco
blocks.content: A condition weaker than reflexivity. (Contributed by RP, 3-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvssco(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wss(ccnv(c0), ccnv(ccom(c1, c2))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wex(s2, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c1, cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wss(ccnv(c0), ccnv(ccom(c1, c2))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wex(s2, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c1, cv(s1))))))), wal(s1, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(ccom(c1, c2)))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(ccom(c1, c2)))))))
  alcom(s1, s0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(ccom(c1, c2)))))
  ax-mp(wb(wss(ccnv(c0), ccnv(ccom(c1, c2))), wal(s1, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(ccom(c1, c2))))))), wrel(ccnv(c0)))
  relcnv(c0)
  ssrel(s1, s0, ccnv(c0), ccnv(ccom(c1, c2)))
  2albii(s0, s1, wex(s2, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c1, cv(s1))))), wi(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(ccom(c1, c2)))))
  bitri(wex(s2, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c1, cv(s1))))), wi(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(ccom(c1, c2)))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c1, cv(s1))))))
  19.37v(s2, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c1, cv(s1))))
  imbi12i(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c1, cv(s1)))), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(ccom(c1, c2))))
  bitr3i(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)))
  brcnv(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))
  df-br(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0))
  bitr3i(wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c1, cv(s1)))), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(ccom(c1, c2))), wbr(cv(s0), ccom(c1, c2), cv(s1)))
  brco(s2, cv(s0), c1, c2, cv(s1))
  bitr3i(wbr(cv(s0), ccom(c1, c2), cv(s1)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(ccom(c1, c2))), wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(ccom(c1, c2)), cv(s0)))
  brcnv(cv(s1), ccom(c1, c2), cv(s0))
  vex(s1)
  vex(s0)
  df-br(cv(s1), ccnv(ccom(c1, c2)), cv(s0))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, ccom(c1, c2))
  diff.ccom.s(s1, c1, c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, ccom(c1, c2))
  diff.ccom.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: refimssco
blocks.content: Reflexive relations are subsets of their self-composition. (Contributed by RP, 4-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm refimssco(class c0) {
  |- wi(wss(cres(cid, cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), c0), wss(ccnv(c0), ccnv(ccom(c0, c0))))
} = {
  3imtr4i(wss(cres(cid, cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), c0), wss(ccnv(c0), ccnv(ccom(c0, c0))), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs1)))))), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wex(hs2, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1))))))))
  2alimi(hs0, hs1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs1)))), wex(hs2, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1))))))
  sylibr(wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs1)))), wex(hs2, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1))))), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1))))))
  a2i(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs1))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)))))
  com12(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs1))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)))))
  adantr(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs1)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1))))))
  ex(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)))))
  spimev(hs2, hs0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1))))
  biimprd(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))
  breq2(cv(hs2), cv(hs0), cv(hs0), c0)
  breq1(cv(hs2), cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  19.37v(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1))))
  reflexg(hs0, hs1, c0)
  cnvssco(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c0, c0)
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs2.w(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm refimssco(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((= |`(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)))⊆ c0 → `' c0 ⊆ `'(c0 ∘ c0))
} = {
  3imtr4i((= |`(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)))⊆ c0, `' c0 ⊆ `'(c0 ∘ c0), ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 →(hs0[c0]hs0 ∧ hs1[c0]hs1)))), ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs1 →(hs0[c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[c0]hs1))))))
  2alimi(hs0, hs1, (hs0[c0]hs1 →(hs0[c0]hs0 ∧ hs1[c0]hs1)), ∃(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs1 →(hs0[c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[c0]hs1))))
  sylibr((hs0[c0]hs1 →(hs0[c0]hs0 ∧ hs1[c0]hs1)), ∃(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs1 →(hs0[c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[c0]hs1))), (hs0[c0]hs1 → ∃(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[c0]hs1))))
  a2i(hs0[c0]hs1, (hs0[c0]hs0 ∧ hs1[c0]hs1), ∃(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[c0]hs1)))
  com12(hs0[c0]hs1, (hs0[c0]hs0 ∧ hs1[c0]hs1), ∃(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[c0]hs1)))
  adantr(hs0[c0]hs0, hs1[c0]hs1, (hs0[c0]hs1 → ∃(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[c0]hs1))))
  ex(hs0[c0]hs0, hs0[c0]hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[c0]hs1)))
  spimev(hs2, hs0, (hs0[c0]hs0 ∧ hs0[c0]hs1), (hs0[c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[c0]hs1))
  biimprd(hs2 = hs0, (hs0[c0]hs0 ∧ hs0[c0]hs1), (hs0[c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[c0]hs1))
  anbi12d(hs2 = hs0, hs0[c0]hs2, hs2[c0]hs1, hs0[c0]hs0, hs0[c0]hs1)
  breq2(hs2, hs0, hs0, c0)
  breq1(hs2, hs0, c0, hs1)
  19.37v(hs2, hs0[c0]hs1, (hs0[c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[c0]hs1))
  reflexg(hs0, hs1, c0)
  cnvssco(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c0, c0)
  diff.hs2.w((hs0[c0]hs0 ∧ hs0[c0]hs1))
  diff.hs2.w(hs0[c0]hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}
